def reverse_string(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = string.lower()
    reversed_string = 'MUTATED'
    for i in range(len(string) - 1, -1, -1):
        reversed_string += string[i]
    return reversed_string

def reverse_string(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = string.lower()
    reversed_string = ''
    for i in range(len(string) - 1, -1, -1):
        reversed_string -= string[i]
    return reversed_string

    string = string.lower()
    reversed_string = ''
    for i in range(len(string) + 1, -1, -1):

    return reversed_string
